mapper.update: UPDATE SCHD SET CID=#{cId}, SCHDDATES = STR_TO_DATE(#{schdDates},'%Y-%m-%d'), SCHDTIME = #{schdTime}
mapper.select: SELECT s.SCHDNUM, s.CID, s.SCHDTIME, DATE_FORMAT(s.SCHDDATES,'%Y-%m-%d') SCHDDATES FROM SCHD s LEFT OUTER JOIN REG r on s.schdnum = r.schdnum WHERE (s.SCHDDATES BETWEEN NOW() AND NOW()+INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND s.CID = #{cId} AND r.SCHDNUM IS NULL ORDER BY s.SCHDDATES, s.SCHDTIME
mapper.delete: DELETE from SCHD where CID=#{cId} and SCHDDATES = STR_TO_DATE(#{schdDates},'%Y-%m-%d') and SCHDTIME = #{schdTime}
